Name: Virus at Home
About the game: Tell your kids this is how it happened. Fight the pandemic like a legend! Stop the virus from entering your home by all means, if it does enter... blow it into pieces. Get vaccinated! Stay one step ahead of the deadly virus by getting your 46th booster shot. Kill every mutation! They just keep on coming... and you have to keep coming up with new ways to kill them. Slay hordes of viruses while listening to killer music. Experience a truly cathartic experience. Clean your chair. Just do it! Save your country! Experience overwhelming national pride in this patriotic experience. Exterminate the mysterious source of the pandemic. Save your country. Avenge your grandparent. What are you waiting for? Go fight like a man and make your president proud! Image used in header capsule/banner 'Man with surgical mask on white background with copy space' was created by Jernej Furman, distributed under Attribution 2.0 Generic (CC BY 2.0) creative commons license ( / ) and was modified (changed) for the purposes of this works promotional material (color graded, cropped and mixed with other elements).
